Title: Prohibit weapon promotion and sale on public property
Summary: Prohibits the promotion, sale, transfer, exchange, giving or disposing of a weapon on property owned by the state or any political subdivision thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง265.36, amd ยง400.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the promotion or sale of a weapon on public property
